Interface WorkoutService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkoutServiceImpl
public interface WorkoutService
Description:

The interface providing services for Workout

    • createNewWorkout

      Workout createNewWorkout(Workout workout, Long memberId)
      Creates a new workout entry.
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of Workout entity
      memberId - the id of entity Member
      Returns:
      an object of Workout entity

    • getWorkout

      Fetches the workout by its id.

      id - the id of the workout
      Returns:
      an object of Workout entity

    • getWorkout

      Workout getWorkout(String name)
      Fetches the workout by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the workout
      Returns:
      an object of Workout entity

    • getWorkoutExercises

      List<Map<String,Object>> getWorkoutExercises(Workout workout)
      Fetches the exercises based on workout template defined, which is passed in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of Workout entity
      Returns:
      an list of map of category and list of Exercise ( List(Map(String, List(Object))) )

    • updateWorkout

      Workout updateWorkout(Workout newWorkout)
      Updates the existing workout with new workout passed
      Parameters:
      newWorkout - an object of Workout entity
      Returns:
      an object of Workout entity

    • deleteWorkout

      void deleteWorkout(Long id, Long memberId)
      Deletes the existing workout by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the workout
      memberId - the id of entity Member
